Bethlehem.Lincoln Leadership Academy Charter Schoo:
Lincoln Leadership Academy Charter School is a midsized, urban, public charter school located in Allentown, Pennsylvania. It is one of four public charters schools operating in Lehigh County, Pennsylvania.
In 2013, enrollment was 543 pupils in grades first through 12th, with 52% of pupils eligible for a federal free or reduced-price lunch due to the family meeting the federal poverty level.
